mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.username AS "username", a.url AS "url", a.is_channel AS "isChannel", a.usernum AS "usernum", a.update_num AS "updateNum", a.offset_ AS "offset", a.status AS "status", a.out_ AS "out", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.upcate_date AS "upcateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,a.url ,c.accessHash from tl_group a join tl_chat c on c.chatid=a.id where ( a.url is null or a.url ='' ) and ( a.out_=0 or a.out_ is null ) and c.account='8618566104318'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_group( id, name,username, url, is_channel, usernum, update_num, offset_, status, out_, create_by, create_date, update_by, upcate_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name},#{username}, #{url}, #{isChannel}, #{usernum}, #{updateNum}, #{offset}, #{status}, #{out}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{upcateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tl_group SET name = #{name}, username=#{username}, url = #{url}, is_channel = #{isChannel}, usernum = #{usernum}, status = #{status}, out_ = #{out}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, upcate_date = #{upcateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
